headings: Be part of the next generation of intelligence analysis leaders.
Admission Requirements, Degree Plan and Courses
What Can You Do With an Intelligence and Analysis Degree?
Why Earn My Intelligence and Analysis Master’s Degree at Angelo State?
Journal of Homeland and National Security Perspectives
paragraphs: Gain in-depth knowledge about the relationships between intelligence and national security that are critical to accomplishing the missions of the U.S. intelligence community and national security agencies.

Our 100% online degree program is consistently ranked as one of the best in the nation. Take advantage of our comprehensive degree plan that includes topics ranging from policy making and military strategy, planning and operations - to constitutional issues and the rule of law in a democracy. You will join a community of like-minded students, as well as interact with professors who are acknowledged experts in their fields.
Our faculty have extensive experience in intelligence and analysis. They stay up to date with current national intelligence issues and regularly publish their research.
Tuition & FeesWe don’t sacrifice quality for affordability. Angelo State is committed to helping you achieve your educational goals with as little debt as possible.

ASU Distinguished Graduate ScholarshipsEarn our premier graduate scholarship based on your highest degree GPA. Once you are admitted to an ASU graduate program, you will automatically be considered. No application is necessary.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.

The increasing complexity of national intelligence issues and intelligence analysis is driving an ongoing demand for well-rounded professionals and a steady growth in career opportunities within the intelligence community.

With your ASU intelligence and analysis degree, you will be prepared to start or advance your career in the military, national intelligence, international relations, federal law enforcement or other agencies in the intelligence community.

We have existing Articulation Agreements with various universities, military branches and federal agencies, including the National Security Agency and the National Cryptologic University, which allow you to receive academic credit for prior training related to intelligence and analysis.

Angelo State has been designated a “Military Friendly School” by VIQTORY Media and G.I. Jobs magazine. We have also been named a Top 10 “Best for Vets College” by the Military Times. Our VETS Center is here to help you with your military education benefits, andTA Scholarshipsare available to help offset the cost of your tuition.

Students, practitioners, researchers, scholars, policymakers, theorists, and others interested in homeland and national security concerns can voice their thoughts in thisstudent-led peer-reviewed publication.

Whether you’re pursuing a master’s degree, doctoral degree or certificate/certification, you have access to all the services in ourCollege of Graduate Studies and Research. You’ll find information and resources for everything from registering for classes and writing a thesis – to available graduate/teaching assistantships and graduate research opportunities.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
